column5: Just finished my last exam today and i am now out of school!! Now its all fishing and camping from here. Have a good summer everybody!!
your not out of school? lol  i know what ya ment,  congrats on finishing the year, have a good time fishing and camping this summer.   jason

congrats on completing another year of school. Being in university and working on a co-op job right now ... my piece of advice to you is that ... enjoy the summers while you still have'em. Soon time you'll be spending most of it doing a summer job or taking summer school.  Enjoy it!
ahhh summer let the endless days at the river begin

Congrats Mike, enjoy the summer.  Victor - a few years from now you'll appreciate those lost co-op summers, school meant diddly it was the co-op placements that made U Waterloo worth going to (now summer terms on campus - those were a load of unprintable here fun).
Enjoy your summer now. These are the times that you and your friends talk about years later!

SCHOOL HAS ALMOST bitten the DUST for one more go around. My working day at SCHOOL ends at 200 pm this coming Thursday. I'm on a plane heading to BC 4 hours later. Up to Terrace BC the next day. Spooning Chinook on the Skenna river the following morning.  <- this silly icony thingy doesn't even remotely do my grin justice.
Please do us all proud! and DO NOT FORGET THE MARSHMALLOWS! Have a great trip!! and I look forward to the report!  G...
